content.question: The diagrams above represent aqueous solutions of compound <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> at various molarities. Each dot represents one mole of the solute, and the volume of solution in the large boxes is twice the volume in the small boxes. Which solution has the highest molarity?

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
